_header: Regina celi Queen of thy soth
_description: Mystical invitation of the Virgin Mary to man — ten 8-line stanzas with refrain, ‘Maria virgo assumpta est’

BLHar2251.First Lines:
REgina celi qwene of thy sowthA fourmed by Salamon his
                    sapience…
BLHar2251.Last Lines:
…And make hir Ioye at this blessid festThat she may comfort vs
                    in al oure fereMaria virgo assumpta est
BLHar2251.Editions:
MacCracken,  Henry Noble. 
             “Lydgatiana.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         131 (1913): 40-63: 51.
